title: Growing Suspicions
description: It's suspicious because nothing looks suspicious, and if it looks suspicious from the start it's obviously suspicious.

title: Detective's Assistant
description: Now it's your business to know what other people don't know too.

title: Genius Detective
description: You're already a genius at unraveling mysteries... but how is it possible that everywhere you go someone ends up dead?

title: Golden Truth
description: You can solve any mystery by now. The path to the Golden Land has already been revealed to you.

title: The first step
description: Congratulations, you broke the magical number. Take a breath now, it will only get more difficult.

title: Casual watcher
description: You're used to seeing character's eyes bigger than their nose. If they have any nose.

title: A millionaire
description: You DID buy all of them, right?

title: Bragging rights
description: That's... a lot. You can be proud of yourself, that's for sure.

title: A lot of free time
description: Now pause, take a breath and stretch a bit. Remember not to sit too close to the screen.

title: Not Even My Final Form
description: Your power level is way above others'. The only way is up.

title: Gotta Watch Them All!
description: You should already know what that picture means.

title: The Collector
description: No, wait. The plural of anime is anime.

title: The Maniac
description: Is this healthy? You should contact your doctor.

title: The Legend
description: You're one of the chosen ones. You don't even have to brag, since everyone heard about you.

title: Database Breaker
description: Are you having fun, breaking all the rules?

title: This Is It
description: There is no higher level. You can stop now. Everyone, go home.

title: Hair Antenna
description: Whose watch time are you calling puny?

title: Endurance Training
description: By doing a daily ten-episode run, you are sure to become a master in no time!

title: Consciousness Upload
description: Consuming the medium becomes a lot easier once you yourself are raw data.

title: Wicked Cultured
description: By making a deal with the devil, you have ensured access to even the most obscure of materials.

title: Cassette Tape
description: The first time you watched these, you didn't even know what they were.

title: Solid Color
description: Bomber jackets, high-waisted jeans, an overload of patterns, and bishies everywhere.

title: It's Raining... Tragic Backstories!
description: It might be the nostalgia lens, but you swear things had more substance back then.

title: Blockbuster
description: Man, do you feel old as all hell.

title: Less Than Three
description: Mean series score lower than 3. Is it hate, or is it love?

title: Watching Anime Is Suffering
description: Mean series score lower than 5. Someone has to counterweight the fanboys, right?

title: I Love Movies
description: Mean series score higher than 8. How about using the whole scale and re-rating stuff? That could make you look less like a fanboy...

title: Chronomaster
description: Your discerning eye has traveled across the aeons of animation.

title: VHS Master Race
description: You overwrote my cartoons with The Karate Kid?! MOOOM!

title: I Like Them Long
description: Didn't fall asleep while watching long series. 100 episodes isn't a big deal to you.
